title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When exporting a Zip file in a workspace with multiple projects, the checkboxes do not use a busy cursor during the update process.
EB: The checkboxes should display a busy cursor when updating during the export of a Zip file in a workspace with multiple projects.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Open a workspace with many projects.2. Select the option to export as a Zip file.3. Select all the projects.4. Choose some file types.5. Click 'Ok' to start the export process.
